FuncDef:
The pki cmp session command creates a CMP session and displays the CMP session view.
The undo pki cmp session command deletes a CMP session.
By default, no CMP session is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a CMP session.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When applying for a certificate, you need create a CMP session and configure in CMP session view.
Precautions
Only one CMP session can be created in each PKI domain, and PKI domains cannot share a CMP session.
